title: क्या भाजपा और आरएसएस कार्यकर्ता द्वारा इस औरत के साथ अमानवीय व्यवहार किया गया ?
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: Woman publicly beaten up by husband on a village panchayat’s orders for allegedly eloping with another man in Bulandshahr. According to Praveen Ranjan Singh, SP Bulandshahr, 'Police arrested the woman’s husband, former panchayat head & his son in the matter'. (22.3.18) pic.twitter.com/B3EX2LtaIo
